content.rendered:
Free Download House Plans

Download a free sample Planning Package, which includes planning drawings representative of those you can purchase from our site.

Included within the sample pack are:

  • Sample Elevation drawings, formatted to 1:100 @ A3
  • Sample Floor Plan drawings, formatted to 1: 100 @ A3
  • Sample Section drawings, formatted to 1:00 @ A3
  • Front Elevation 3D Rendered View

This constitutes the minimum required to meet the ‘Mandatory Documents’ standard of the UK national requirements. Your local planning authority may require additional information specific to your region – more information can be found on the Planning Portal.

Please note that the contents of the Sample Planning Pack are subject to change without notice – we are constantly updating our plans and therefore what is ‘representative’ of our work will also change continually.
